title: Fix libTHD's dependies to correctly link against _C.so
body_html:
Hello!
I am trying to install the PyTorch from source with conda (Ubuntu 16.04.4，CUDA 8.0, cudnn 5.1.10, Python 3.5.2 :: Anaconda 4.2.0 64-bit). When I import (py)torch in Python 2.7.13 environment, I'm getting errors:

import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in
File "/usr/local/share/anaconda2/envs/onnx_env/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 53, in
from torch._C import *
ImportError: /usr/local/share/anaconda2/envs/onnx_env/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/_C.so: undefined symbol: _ZN3MPI8Datatype4FreeEv

body:
Hello!
I am trying to install the PyTorch from source with conda (Ubuntu 16.04.4，CUDA 8.0, cudnn 5.1.10, Python 3.5.2 :: Anaconda 4.2.0 64-bit). When I import (py)torch in Python 2.7.13 environment, I'm getting errors:

>>> import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/usr/local/share/anaconda2/envs/onnx_env/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 53, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: /usr/local/share/anaconda2/envs/onnx_env/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/_C.so: undefined symbol: _ZN3MPI8Datatype4FreeEv
